pullrequest.title: Adding keyboard_teleop and minor adjustments to walking action server

content.raw:
Thanks for the fixes. Seems to run fine now.

Some doubts:
* Can't a one-step trajectory be performed?
* After start playing a bit with the teleop, it still not clear to me what is the exact movement that will be done when press "u", "o", "m" and "." Diagonal movements? Yaws? and the center "k"? Could we have a little note on screen about keys functions? Or maybe @spaepcke could give us some light about improving this.

A part from this, seems to work fine. nice job.
content.html:
Thanks for the fixes. Seems to run fine now.

Some doubts: Can't a one-step trajectory be performed? After start playing a bit with the teleop, it still not clear to me what is the exact movement that will be done when press "u", "o", "m" and "." Diagonal movements? Yaws? and the center "k"? Could we have a little note on screen about keys functions? Or maybe @spaepcke could give us some light about improving this.

A part from this, seems to work fine. nice job.
